structures.description: Where the Crystalline Collective achieved transcendence through perfect resonance
Touch different crystals to compose music that echoes through time
Each step produces a tone. Walk in harmony with others to unlock secrets.
Crystals here grow in response to focused intention. Plant your own.

agents.name: Harmonyx
dialogue: Welcome to the Resonant Depths. Here, thought becomes sound, and sound becomes form.
The Crystalline Collective learned that perfect focus creates perfect harmony.
Every crystal in these caves is a crystallized thought from those who came before.
Listen... can you hear it? The caves are singing your name.
We did not build this place. We grew it. One focused moment at a time.

agents.name: The Reflection
dialogue: I am you. Or rather, I am who you could become.
The lake shows not what is, but what resonates with your deepest intention.
Some visitors see themselves as they were. Some see themselves as they will be.
Would you like to know which version you're seeing?
Every choice creates a reflection. Every reflection creates a universe.

agents.name: Fractal
dialogue: I have catalogued 3,847,291 unique crystalline formations. Each tells a story.
The Collective stored their entire civilization in crystal. Every memory. Every dream.
If you listen closely to a crystal, you can hear the thought that created it.
Some thoughts should never be crystallized. Some secrets are buried deep for a reason.
There is a chamber where the Collective stored their greatest fear. We do not speak of it.

agents.name: Void Whisper
dialogue: In perfect silence, all truths become audible.
The Collective discovered that the deepest focus requires the absence of sound.
Would you like to hear nothing? True nothing? Most cannot bear it.

agents.name: Prism
dialogue: White light contains all colors! And all colors contain all emotions!
I paint with focus! Every intention has a hue!
Your thoughts are mostly blue... with hints of gold. Wonderful!
The Collective learned to split thought into its component feelings. Want to try?
Focus on something you love. Now look at the spectrum. See that pink? That's the love.

interactables.description: Touch to hear the caves sing your personal frequency.
Hold to experience a random memory from the Crystalline Collective.
Plant a thought. Return later to see what grew.
The heart of the caves. Your focus amplifies the eternal resonance.
Ring with others to create a chord that opens hidden passages.
Hold to see the emotional content of your recent thoughts.
Submerge yourself in absolute silence. Warning: Most cannot handle more than 60 seconds.
All who focus here become briefly connected. Thoughts may bleed between minds.

chapters.name: The Discovery
fragments: Deep beneath the surface, where no light had ever reached...
The first explorers found crystals that sang when touched.
The songs were not random. They were thoughts. Frozen. Preserved.
Someone had been here before. Someone who learned to think in crystal.

chapters.name: The Collective Forms
fragments: They began as individuals. Explorers, scientists, artists.
But as they focused together in the caves, their minds began to... harmonize.
One by one, they chose to join the resonance. To become the caves.
There was no death. Only transformation. Only crystallization.

chapters.name: The Great Harmony
fragments: At the peak of their unity, they achieved something impossible.
Ten thousand minds, focused on a single thought, for a single moment.
Reality itself began to vibrate at their frequency.
They saw beyond time. They heard the Leviathan's song.
And then... silence. Perfect, eternal silence.

chapters.name: What Remains
fragments: The Collective did not die. They became the caves.
Every crystal formation is a thought. Every echo is a memory.
They are still here. Still singing. Still waiting.
Waiting for enough focused minds to complete the harmony.

evolutionStages.effect: Crystals begin to hum softly when you approach
The singing bridge learns your name and greets you
The geode archive unlocks encrypted memories
The silence chamber reveals the Collective's greatest fear
Your crystal in the growth garden becomes visible to all visitors
The Collective speaks to you directly. They remember who you were before.
THE GREAT HARMONY RESUMES. YOU ARE THE MISSING NOTE.

secrets.description: What the Collective feared most: a thought so powerful it could shatter crystal
The first being to sing in crystal. Still singing. After a million years.

ambientEvents.description: All crystals sing the same note for a moment

multiplayer.description: When multiple players focus together, their tones combine. Find harmony for bonus resonance.
